backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Instagram-related requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of key frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React UI showing profile data, sanitized outbound links, a dedicated Instagram button, and share/notification logic.
frontend/src/components/Toast.tsx: Toast notification system with success/error messages and auto-dismiss behavior.
frontend/src/features/profile/profileTyp: Type definitions for profile data and default profile containing a single Snapchat link.
frontend/src/features/profile/useProfile: Hook managing profile persistence with migrations and cleanup removing Twitter/X and Instagram links.
frontend/src/features/profile/validation: Validation helpers for URLs, outbound link safety, phone sanitization, email validation, and safe mailto generation.
frontend/src/features/share/useCopyToCli: Clipboard hook providing modern and fallback copy mechanisms with error tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, stored identity restoration, and auth-client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries exist and data is clientâ€‘side only.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/styles setup defining light/dark theme variables, typography settings, and custom utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, theme extensions, custom colors mapped to CSS variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing required changes to remove a duplicate Instagram button and ensure a single button links to the specified profile URL.
